body:
By default, the phrase search makes an OR search on all the specified keywords, i.e. it will look for documents which contains either the keywords String1, String2, String3 or String4

db.collection.find({$text: {$search: "String1 String3"}}, {score: {$meta: "text Score"}}).sort({score:{$meta:"text Score"}})

I think you were missing the space in between String1 and String3.
title: MongoDB text index won't return proper results in some cases
